Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") Mesh = Handle:WaitForChild("Mesh")
Players = game:GetService("Players") InsertService = game:GetService("InsertService")
Remover = script:WaitForChild("Remover")
FakeHandle = Tool:FindFirstChild("FakeHandle") if FakeHandle then FakeHandle:Destroy() Handle.Transparency = 0 end
PenguinModel = InsertService:LoadAsset(170822767) Penguin = PenguinModel:GetChildren()[1]:Clone() if PenguinModel and PenguinModel.Parent then PenguinModel:Destroy() end
Limbs = {"Head", "Torso", "Left Arm", "Right Arm", "Left Leg", "Right Leg"}
Gravity = 196.20
ReloadTime = 2 MaxDistance = 10
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom BasePart.Locked = true BasePart.CanCollide = true
Equipped = false InUse = false Sliding = false
Spawn(function() if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end)
ClientControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if Mode == "Click" and Player == player then if not InUse and Value then InUse = true Handle.Transparency = 1 MakePenguin() elseif Value and not Sliding and Tool.Enabled then if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end if not PlayerPenguin or not PlayerPenguin.Parent then MakePenguin() end if (Torso.Position - PenguinTorso.Position).magnitude > MaxDistance then return end Sliding = true if PlayerPenguin and PlayerPenguin.Parent then PlayerPenguin:Destroy() end local CharacterSizeMeasurement = Instance.new("Model") for i, v in pairs(Character:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and CheckTable(Limbs, v.Name) then local Limb = v:Clone() Limb.Parent = CharacterSizeMeasurement end end local CharacterSize = CharacterSizeMeasurement:GetModelSize() SlidePart = BasePart:Clone() SlidePart.Name = "SlidePart" SlidePart.Size = Vector3.new(CharacterSize.X, 1, CharacterSize.Z) SlidePart.Transparency = 1 local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = SlidePart Weld.Part1 = Torso Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, 0.5) * CFrame.Angles((math.pi / 2), 0, 0) Weld.Parent = SlidePart local PenguinScale = 2.5 FakePenguinDisplay = BasePart:Clone() FakePenguinDisplay.Name = "FakePenguinDisplay" FakePenguinDisplay.Size = (Handle.Size * PenguinScale) local PenguinMesh = Mesh:Clone() PenguinMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(PenguinScale, PenguinScale, PenguinScale) PenguinMesh.Parent = FakePenguinDisplay local Weld = Instance.new("Weld") Weld.Part0 = FakePenguinDisplay Weld.Part1 = Torso Weld.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -((Torso.Size.Z / 2) + (FakePenguinDisplay.Size.Z / 2) - 0.25)) Weld.Parent = FakePenguinDisplay FakePenguinDisplay.Parent = Character BodyGyro = Instance.new("BodyGyro") BodyGyro.maxTorque = Vector3.new(math.huge, math.huge, math.huge) BodyGyro.Parent = SlidePart local Mass = (GetTotalMass(Character) * Gravity) BodyVelocity = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") BodyVelocity.maxForce = Vector3.new(Mass, 0, Mass) BodyVelocity.velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.Parent = SlidePart SlidePart.Parent = Character if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.PlatformStand = true end pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeClient(Player, "Animation", true) end) while Sliding do local TargetPoint pcall(function() TargetPoint = ServerControl:InvokeClient(Player) end) if TargetPoint then BodyGyro.cframe = CFrame.new(SlidePart.Position, Vector3.new(TargetPoint.X, SlidePart.Position.Y, TargetPoint.Z)) * CFrame.Angles(math.pi, 0, 0) BodyVelocity.velocity = CFrame.new(SlidePart.Position, TargetPoint).lookVector * 50 end wait() end for i, v in pairs({SlidePart, FakePenguinDisplay}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end if Equipped then MakePenguin() PenguinTorso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) end Torso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) elseif Sliding and not Value then Tool.Enabled = false Sliding = false if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeClient(Player, "Animation", false) end) wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end end)
function CheckTable(Table, String) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if string.lower(v) == string.lower(String) then return true end end return false end
function GetTotalMass(Parent) local Mass = 0 local function GetMass(Parent) for i, v in pairs(Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then Mass = (Mass + v:GetMass()) end GetMass(v) end end GetMass(Parent) return Mass end
function MakePenguin() if PlayerPenguin and PlayerPenguin.Parent then PlayerPenguin:Destroy() end PlayerPenguin = Penguin:Clone() PenguinTorso = PlayerPenguin:FindFirstChild("Torso") PlayerPenguin:FindFirstChild("Creator").Value = Player local RemoverClone = Remover:Clone() RemoverClone.Disabled = false RemoverClone.Parent = PlayerPenguin PlayerPenguin.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") PenguinTorso.CFrame = Torso.CFrame - Torso.CFrame.lookVector * ((PenguinTorso.Size.Z / 2) + (Torso.Size.Z / 2) + 5) PenguinTorso.CFrame = PenguinTorso.CFrame - Vector3.new(0, (Torso.Size.Y / 2), 0) end
function Equipped() Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") Handle.Transparency = 0 if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false InUse = false Sliding = false for i, v in pairs({PlayerPenguin, SlidePart, FakePenguinDisplay}) do if v and v.Parent then v:Destroy() end end pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeClient(Player, "Animation", false) end) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.PlatformStand = false end Handle.Transparency = 0 end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Figure = script.Parent Creator = Figure:WaitForChild("Creator").Value
Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function DestroyModel() Debris:AddItem(Figure, 2) end
if Creator:IsA("Player") then Character = Creator.Character if Character then Character.Changed:connect(function(Property) if not Character.Parent then DestroyModel() end end) else DestroyModel() end else DestroyModel() end

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Slide = Tool:WaitForChild("Slide")
ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl") ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl")
ServerControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if Mode == "Animation" then if Value then SlideAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Slide) if SlideAnim then SlideAnim:Play() end elseif not Value then if SlideAnim then SlideAnim:Stop() end end else return Humanoid.TargetPoint end end)
function Click(Down) if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeServer("Click", Down) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() Click(true) end) Mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() Click(false) end) end
function Unequipped() PlayerMouse = nil if SlideAnim then SlideAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)
